mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_asm_method (asm_method_id, project_id, asm_method_name, asm_obj_id, is_static, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{item.asmMethodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.asmMethodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.asmObjId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isStatic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
